Disclaimer for Yay Tour

Introduction

This disclaimer governs your use of Yay Tour. By using our platform, you accept this disclaimer in full. If you disagree with any part of this disclaimer, you must not use Yay Tour.

No Liability for Third-Party Actions

Yay Tour serves as a facilitator, connecting users interested in attending various events. While we strive to ensure a safe and harmonious environment, we are not liable for the conduct, actions, or behavior of any users or event organizers. Your interactions with other users or third parties, including but not limited to attending events, are solely between you and such parties. You assume all risks associated with these interactions.

No Endorsement of Events or Users

The listing of an event on our platform should not be seen as an endorsement or recommendation. Additionally, a user's history on the app or any ratings should not be considered as a guarantee of that individual's reliability, safety, or suitability.

Service Availability and Accuracy

While we aim to provide accurate event information and consistent service availability, we make no guarantees in this regard. Yay Tour will not be responsible for any loss, inconvenience, or damage arising from the use, unavailability, or unreliability of its services.

Limitations on Service Use

You agree not to misuse the services provided by Yay Tour in any manner that could impair the functioning of the platform or interfere with other users' rights to use and enjoy the service. Violation of this clause may lead to the immediate termination of your account.

No Warranties

The services provided by Yay Tour are on an "as is" and "as available" basis without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.

Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permissible by law, Yay Tour shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, punitive, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of, or in any way connected with, your access to, display of, or use of this platform.

Governing Law

This disclaimer will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York USA, and any disputes relating to this disclaimer will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of New York USA.

Changes to This Disclaimer

We reserve the right to change this disclaimer at any time. It is the responsibility of users to stay informed about changes to this disclaimer by checking this page periodically.
